responsibilities: Write product or system development code.
Participate in, or lead design reviews with peers and stakeholders to decide amongst available technologies.
Review code developed by other developers and provide feedback to ensure best practices (e.g., style guidelines, checking code in, accuracy, testability, and efficiency).
Contribute to existing documentation or educational content and adapt content based on product/program updates and user feedback.
Triage product or system issues and debug/track/resolve by analyzing the sources of issues and the impact on hardware, network, or service operations and quality.
skills: Proficiency in code and system health, diagnosis and resolution, and software test engineering.
Experience with software development in one or more programming languages.
Experience with data structures or algorithms.
Experience in Generative AI (Large Language Models, Multi-Modal, Large Vision Models).
Experience with machine learning algorithms and tools (e.g., TensorFlow), artificial intelligence, deep learning, natural language processing or other ML discipline.
analysis:
The job responsibilities focus on software development tasks such as writing code, participating in design reviews, reviewing code, contributing to documentation, and debugging systems. These are general responsibilities for a software development role and do not specifically indicate work with Generative AI or language models.

However, the skills section provides more insight into the nature of the job. It explicitly mentions "Experience in Generative AI (Large Language Models, Multi-Modal, Large Vision Models)" and "Experience with machine learning algorithms and tools (e.g., TensorFlow), artificial intelligence, deep learning, natural language processing or other ML discipline." These skills clearly indicate that the job involves working with Generative AI and language models, as it requires experience in these areas.

Therefore, while the responsibilities are general to software development, the skills required for the job strongly suggest involvement with Generative AI and language models.
